original_text: Hezekiah received the letter from the messengers and read it. Then he went up to the temple of the Lord and spread it out before the Lord.
korean_text: 히스기야가 사자의 손에서 편지를 받아보고 여호와의 성전에 올라가서 히스기야가 그 편지를 여호와 앞에 펴 놓고

sentences.original_text: Hezekiah received the letter from the messengers
Then he went up to the temple of the Lord
and spread it out before the Lord
